lead_paragraph: ON THE FRENCH FRONTIER, Oct. 2 (U.P.) -- Edouard Herriot, elder statesman of the Third Republic, is interned at his family estate near Lyon under the surveillance of ten police inspectors.
snippet: ON THE FRENCH FRONTIER, Oct. 2 (U.P.) -- Edouard Herriot, elder statesman of the Third Republic, is interned at his family estate near Lyon under the surveillance of ten police inspectors....
